titleStmt.title: Scandal proof, or An heroick poem on the renowned champions of the good old cause

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Don Pedro Valesco, Tasco Rasco Rero, Don John of Austria's cozens, uncles, sisters son, being his own nephew,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Addressed to "Impudent Dick Janeway, and the rest of the factious."

person.persName: Don John of Austria's cozens, uncles, sisters son, being his own nephew
